# CalcSuite.in - Free Online Calculators

CalcSuite provides a comprehensive suite of free, fast, and mobile-friendly online calculators for financial, math, health, and India-specific needs.

## Core Calculator Sections

- Financial: Mortgage, Loan, Auto Loan, Investment, Retirement, Salary, Inflation, SIP.
- India Specific: GST (2025), EMI, Income Tax (FY 2025-26), FD, RD, PPF, HRA, Home Loan Eligibility.
- Health & Fitness: BMI, Calorie, Body Fat, BMR, Ideal Weight, Pregnancy, Ovulation.
- Math & Basic: Scientific, Triangle, Fraction, Percentage, Unit Converter.

## Authoritative Tools

1. GST Calculator India: https://calcsuite.in/calculators/india-gst
2. Income Tax Calculator (FY 2025-26): https://calcsuite.in/calculators/india-tax
3. EMI Calculator: https://calcsuite.in/calculators/india-emi
4. SIP Calculator: https://calcsuite.in/calculators/sip

## Technical Access

- Sitemap: https://calcsuite.in/sitemap.xml
- Robots.txt: https://calcsuite.in/robots.txt
